name: Aimgod
description:
The ultimate training and warmup solution for FPS players: Aimgod combines human-like AI with the help of advanced algorithms and lot of useful gamemodes to make you better and destroy your enemies in the battlefield, are you ready to become an Aimgod?


FEATURES


  • Play more than 30+ gamemodes (more to come), and create your own game modes
  • Support for different game sensitivities and FOV methods
  • Create your own weapons, characters and bots
  • Create custom bots in seconds thanks to the Quick Bot Creation feature
  • Play fully automated training/warm up sessions thanks to the "Routine" gamemode
  • Play against realistic AI with the "Humaniser" algorithm (advanced algorithm that consider environment, health and opponent behavior to move accordingly)
  • Statistics tracking for every game mode
  • Customize every visual aspect of the maps, wall/floor/roof/bots colors and material roughness
  • This game is still in early access so a lot of features are coming.
